title: Silent Hunter 4 All In One v2
description:
This includes the following:

- Silent Hunter 4 (base game)
- Silent Hunter 4 Uboat Missions
- Mod manager JSGME
- Mod RSRDC
- Mod Trigger Maru


------------ HOW TO ------------

1. Mount and Install the base game, (Silent Hunter 4.iso)
2. Copy the crack from (Crack/sh4.exe) into your installation directory eg. 
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4sh4.exe) and overwrite the existing sh4.exe
3. Mount and install the update -> (SH4 Uboat Missions/pro-sh4um.cue)

4. Install the mod manager from (MODS/jsgme_setup.exe) into your sh4 installation directory eg. 
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4JSGME.exe)

4.1 After you installed the mod manager you should have the file JSGME.exe and the folder MODS in your installation directory eg. 
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4JSGME.exe) and 
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4MODS)

4.2 Copy the two mods into your installation directory under MODS eg.
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4MODSRSRDC_SH15_V550) and 
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4MODS1_TriggerMaru_Overhaul_2-5)

4.3 Open the mod manager and enable the mods eg.
(c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4JSGME.exe)

4.4 Apply the mods 1.Trigger maru and then 2.RSRDC

5. Start the game using sh4.exe eg. (c:Pogram FilesSilent Hunter 4sh4.exe)

------------ HOW TO
